text: Antigua, My Life () is a 2001 Argentine Spanish drama movie directed by Héctor Olivera and was based on the novel by Marcela Serrano. It stars Ana Belén, Cecilia Roth, Daniel Valenzuela, Jorge Marrle, Juan Leyrado, Alfredo Casero. ==Other websites== * Category:2001 drama movies Category:Argentine drama movies Category:Spanish drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Héctor Olivera
title: Antigua, My Life
